claim_summary: Ark. Code § 16-98-303 authorizes each judicial district to establish a drug court program and allows juvenile drug court programs in delinquency, family, and dependency-neglect cases; it states that judges may not order services unless appropriations, funding, and positions are available and directs the Division of Community Correction to provide positions, treatment and services for high-risk offenders【759532697388275†L73-L118】.

source.title: Arkansas Code §16-98-303 - Drug court programs authorized
